mapper.sql: id, menu_name, sname, path, parent_id, menu_type, order_code, icon, param, menu_code, is_menu, status, flag, title, component, description, redirect, level, is_cache
mapper.select:
select
from bd_menu where flag = 'Y'
and level = #{level} or LEVEL = 0
order by is_menu desc,order_code
select id, menu_name as name, parent_id as pid from order by order_code
mapper.insert: insert into (id, menu_name, sname, path, parent_id, menu_type, order_code, icon, param, menu_code, is_menu, status, flag, title, component, description, redirect, level, is_cache) values (#{id}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId}, #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isMenu,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{redirect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isCache,jdbcType=CHAR})

id,

mapper.update:
update
menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sname = #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId},
menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_code = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
param = #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_code = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_menu = #{isMenu,jdbcType=CHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
component = #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
redirect = #{redirect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=CHAR},
is_cache = #{isCache,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id}

update set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sname = #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_code = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param = #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_code = #{menuCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_menu = #{isMenu,jdbcType=CHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, component = #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, redirect = #{redirect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_cache = #{isCache,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id} and flag = 'Y'
